column1: Title:  Sentenced female prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction*
Data source: BJS, National Prisoner Statistics data series (NPS-1)
Updated:  Doris J. James & Paige Harrison
The numbers presented in this spreadsheet may have been revised from those previously published and, therefore, may vary from numbers available from other sources.
Sentenced female prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction*

Note:  Definitions of terms and notes pertaining to individual jurisdictions can be found in the most recent edition of "Correctional Populations in the United States," which can be located at www.ojp.usdoj.gov/bjs/pubalp2.htm#cpus
*Sentenced prisoners includes only those inmates with a sentence of more than 1 year.
--Responsibility for sentenced felons was transferred to the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
